synopsis: In the days long past, a girl sought to make the world a better place. She was a witch, and a virgin. The world she is about to weave has begun.
Warring continues, and Maria decides to enlist new help, but her actions to help dissolve conflict have now attracted attention from the heavens.

title.jp: Fide, Non Armis: Bukidenaku Shinkou de

synopsis: By Michael's words, Maria will lose her powers upon losing her virginity. With Ezekiel now in watch, a new figure decides to approach Maria.
A new witch appears in front of Maria, imparting a different view onto her situation. Meanwhile, Ezekiel ponders over Maria and her actions.

title.jp: Sapere Aude: Yuuki wo, Funbetsu wo

synopsis: While Bernard works on his agenda, Joseph consults Maria in concern for Galfa's well-being. This brings more thoughts to Maria of her actions.

title.jp: Sub Rosa: Bara no Shita de

synopsis: Those in opposition to Maria weigh their options, while a meeting with Joseph makes Maria question her next move when a huge battle breaks out.

title.jp: Bellum Se Ipsum Alet: Sensou wa Sensou wo Kuu

synopsis: Despite orders by Michael to kill Maria should she uses her magic in front of the people again, Ezekiel barely avoids fatally wounding her instead. Meanwhile, Garfa, who lost an arm during the battle and blames Maria for it and swears revenge on her, is assisted by the church who views Maria as a hindrance.

title.jp: Lupus Est Homo Homini: Hito wa, Hito ni Totte Ookami

synopsis: Rumors abound with Maria being faulted for the casualties of war. Bernard continues his agenda, and now approaches Ann's village to speak with Martha.

title.jp: Cum Grano Salis: Hitotsu Mami no Shio wo

synopsis: Thanks to Bernard's machinations Maria is captured and imprisoned by the church. Realizing that she still has not lost her virginity or powers, her friends join forces to rescue her as the English prepare another attack.

title.jp: Odi Et Amo: Ware Nikumi, Ware Aisu

synopsis: Maria’s friends go all out to save her before she is sentenced. Meanwhile, Joseph’s return to battle leads to an encounter with Galfa.

title.jp: Si Vis Amari, Ama: Ai wo Nozomu nara Aise

synopsis: Joseph and Galfa face each other in a bitter duel. Maria finally arrives on scene and what follows is something not even she could have expected.

title.jp: Omnia Vincit Amor: Ai wa Subete ni Katsu

synopsis: Amid a tense showdown against Archangel Michael, the final judgment of Maria’s actions is passed and her ultimate fate revealed.
